content: knit in a simple 1x1 rib with soft 100% baby alpaca this warm and stretchy unisex hat is a must-have for those cold weather days experience level * advanced beginner materials * baby alpaca sport 100% baby alpaca 50g/110yds 1 hank a 1 hank b * stitch marker * tapestry needle finished measurments * circumference 16 un-stretched * height 8½ color shown * denim no 522 a * huckleberry no 805 b
